data.text: @SenatorSaval This is great thank you. Now can you lobby @PHLPublicHealth to reduce the quarantine for SDP kids? They are the only ones doing this for 10-20 days, everyone else has moved to 5 days with a test to return. SDP wants to it but @PHLPublicHealth won't let them!

@SenatorSaval This is contrary to the data, the vaccine does not prevent infection, nor protects others.  Robert W. Malone, MD. MS, Virologist, developer of mRNA stated that the vaccines is not safe for children.   Do your research, Dr Makary at Johns Hopkins, Dr Atlas at Stanford, Dr. Malone.

If you missed us this past Saturday, we’ll be back on Saturday, March 19! Open to all Philadelphians ages 5 and up who need their COVID-19 vaccine or booster. Help us spread the word! Sign up here: https://t.co/tSIIJGvq5J https://t.co/geU4ZTmInP

Our event this past Saturday was made extra special because of contributions from @CouncilmemberKJ, @RepHarris, @OperationWarm, and Small Oven Pastry Shop—thank you so much for helping us serve our neighbors! https://t.co/SnC97VXfgB
